title: Comparison of Service Management and Service Manager portals
content:
The following table compares the features of the Service Management portals: (Service Manager Service Portal and Service Management Service Portal) and and Service Manager ESS.

Category Feature Service Manager Service Portal Service Manager ESS 9.7x Service Management Service Portal
Catalog browsing Offering entitlement rules (e.g. by location, by role, etc.) Yes, with limitations for Service Manager entitlement:

Access filter based on field in Service Manager interaction isn't supported (for agent use case).

 Yes Yes
Catalog browsing Multi-level category navigation for offerings Yes Yes, no limitation Yes, only 2 levels
Catalog browsing Show category image as background Yes No Yes
Catalog browsing Ordering of category tile Yes, support "Sort Order" defined in Service Manager catalog management N/A Yes
Catalog browsing Background color of category tile No N/A Yes
Catalog browsing Color text in offering description Yes Yes Yes
Catalog browsing Rich text in offering description Yes Yes Yes
Catalog browsing Display table in offering description Yes Yes Yes
Catalog browsing Show/hide price to end user Yes No Yes
Catalog browsing Display attachments in offering Yes Yes N/A
Request submission Dynamic user option (dynamic options support value dependency, conditional visibility, and conditional mandatory) Yes Yes Yes
Request submission Support table lookup for user options Yes Yes Yes
Request submission Dynamic checkout form (service and support request) Yes Yes Yes
Request submission Service Manager variables and RAD functions defined in user options and checkout forms Partial, Service Manager global variables (such as $lo.operator) and Service Manager RAD functions (such as jscall()) are supported; 3 thread variables are supported: $requested.for, $requested.for.dept and $requested.for.type Yes N/A
Request submission Configurable external dynamic data source via REST/SOAP Yes, JavaScript is supported for user options No No
Request submission Non-cart item for service offering Yes Yes No
Request submission Information-only item for service/support offering Yes Yes No
Request submission Show delivery target Yes Yes No
Request submission Configurable attachment type Yes Yes Yes
Request submission Request on behalf (Requested for) Yes Yes Yes
Request submission Modify existing request No No Yes
Request submission Re-submit pending or denied service request Yes Yes No
Request submission Smart ticketing

Yes

Note: The text will be auto-extracted from the attached image into the ticket description.

Yes

Note: You may click Image to Text to extract the text from the attached image to the ticket description.

 Yes
Request submission Support Regular Expression on user options Yes No Yes
Request submission Support Help Text on user options Yes No Yes
Request submission Support HTML format in user option label or user option help text Yes No Yes
Request tracking Cancel/Close service request and support request Yes Yes Yes
Request tracking Re-submit closed support request No Yes No
Request tracking Create new request based on exisitng request Yes No Yes
Request tracking Notification for unread comments from IT agent No No No
Request tracking User to service desk conversation on requests (by adding comments, bidirectional) Yes Yes Yes
Request tracking Customization of request detail page Yes Yes Yes
Request tracking Show requests with custom status in request list Yes No Yes
Request tracking Fulfillment progress tracking including SLA and line item Partial, support line item status only. Partial, support line item status only Partial, support fulfillment progress only
Request tracking View related fulfillment records No Yes N/A
Request tracking To-do list (approval, survey, perform action) Yes N/A Yes
Request tracking Show custom actions on the request detail page and to-do list Yes No Yes
Request tracking "Require Action" tab in request list (launched from "Show all" in "Require Action" section of to-do card) Yes N/A No
Search Knowledge search with entitlement Yes Yes Yes
Search Search box is available on the offering detail page Yes No Yes
Search Knowledge article feedback/usage (vote up, vote down, view count) Yes Yes Yes
Search Able to hide knowledge and news Yes No Yes
Search Search external libraries (SharePoint, Confluence, File System, Web pages, Oracle KM system) Yes Yes Yes, sharepoint and confluence
Search Search for request Yes Yes Yes
Approval Service request approval (Service Manager interaction approval) Yes Yes Yes
Approval Line item approval Yes Yes Yes
Approval Change approval Yes Yes Yes
Approval Fulfillment request approval Yes Yes N/A
Approval External approval (BPM) N/A N/A N/A
Approval View approval history (show past/future approver/approval group) Yes Yes Yes
Approval List all approvals processed by the login user No No No
Approval Show and perform approval delegation, whereas define approval delegation at the Agent's side Yes Yes Yes
Approval Define approval delegation in the Portal Yes Yes Yes
Virtual agent IDOL based virtual agent Yes Yes Yes
Virtual agent RASA based virtual agent No No Yes
Virtual agent Chat AIML support (mainly used for virtual agent) No No No
Chat End user live chat Yes Yes Yes
Survey End user survey Yes Yes Yes
Subscription Subscription management - Service Manager or Service Management No Yes, Service Manager only Yes, Service Management only
Subscription Subscription management - Cloud Management No No Yes
Subscription Subscription management - CSA No No No
Portal settings Entitlement based theming Yes, group based No Yes, group/location/role based
Localization Customer self-localization Yes Yes Yes
Localization List and search both localized catalog and default language (English) catalog for a user with non-English locale Yes Yes Yes
Mobility Mobile browser support (Responsive design) Yes No Yes
User Management Log of end user login (user name and IP address) No Yes No
User Management User self-registration Yes Yes No
Accessbility Accessibility Partial Yes (WCAG AA) Partial
License Show license warning message for multiple suppliers N/A N/A N/A
Customization Support custom adapter N/A N/A N/A
Customization Jumpstart support No No No
